name: Learn with Babafounini
description:
My Ludum dare 41 entry.  Theme was "Mix 2 incompatibles genres".

Move with zqsd or wasd, run with shift, look arround with the mouse, talk to Babafounini with E.

ludume dare entry :

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/41/learn-with-babafounini

[SPOILER]

A mix between an educationnal game and an horror survival.
